author: worthalter
content: Basically a fully custodial stake pool?

author: tsudmi
content:
The pool is one of the features. You can also have a private validator (https://stakewise.io/app/privates) or share it with the selected people (https://stakewise.io/app/groups). These features are available for trial as well, would be glad to get feedback.
It is custodial for now. One of the ideas is to have a validator withdrawal key shared between the deposit sender and the application which will require an aggregated signature for performing the validator withdrawal.
